name: Kappa to Reggie
description: Changes the Kappa face emote into a Reggie face emote! :P Reggie emote created by me (CodyMKW) ATTENTION: This style REQUIRES BTTV to function properly. If you do not have BTTV, you will not see the Reggie face. Get BTTV at: http://www.nightdev.com/betterttv

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about:
Hey my name is Cody I'm 27 and a huge fan of Nintendo I love all their games my favorite is the Animal Crossing series when I'm not playing games I love to watch anime umm so theres not really much else I can say about myself! â™¥

If you find any problems with any of my styles feel free to let me know on the styles page and I will try to fix when I have the time!

obsoletion_message: Twitch changed the emotes from CSS to Javascript which broke this!
additional_info: Updates: -January 8, 2015 - Twitch changed the CSS of the Kappa which broke the style I updated to fix this. -January 28, 2015 - Made the style work again but you need to use BTTV in order for it to work.
